name: agent-identity-protocol
description: Decentralized identity and composable reputation middleware for AI agents and smart accounts

scripts.dev: docker compose up -d postgres ipfs anvil && sleep 2 && npm run deploy:local && concurrently "npm run dev:indexer" "npm run dev:resolver"
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployLocal.s.sol --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545 --broadcast
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:sdk && npm run test:indexer && npm run test:resolver
scripts.build: npm -w @agent-identity/sdk run build && npm -w @agent-identity/indexer run build && npm -w @agent-identity/resolver run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf sdk/dist indexer/dist resolver/dist contracts/broadcast contracts/cache
